field_product_description: Infant warmers GE Healthcare’s Giraffe and Panda i-Res Infant Warmers
field_recall_reason_description: Bedside panels and latch areas on the beds may crack, break or become damaged if the unit is not properly used
all-terms-rewrite: Medical Devices, General Hospital & Personal Use
title: Voluntary Field Corrective Action Issued for GE Healthcare’s Giraffe and Panda i-Res Infant Warmers
description: GE Healthcare has issued a Recall for all Giraffe Warmers and Panda iRes Warmers, used by hospitals and clinicians. This voluntary field corrective action is being initiated after GE Healthcare became aware that the bedside panels and latch areas on the beds may crack, break or become damaged.
